error.current: The date of birth must be in the past.
error.invalid: The date of birth must be valid in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD (Year-Month-Day).
error.required: The date of birth is required.

date-of-birth.help-message: Enter the birthdate of the person who the passport is for.
date-of-birth.label: Date of birth on the application

error.valid: The email address must be valid.

email.help-message: Enter it exactly as provided on your passport application form.
email.help-message-secondary: For child applications, provide the full email address for the applicant parent or legal guardian exactly as provided on the passport application.
email.label: Email address

email-confirmation-msg.dont-receive: If you don't receive an email, you can:

dont-receive-list.item-1: review the information you entered and try again or
dont-receive-list.item-2: try again tomorrow—we update our records daily

email-confirmation-msg.if-exists: Your request has been received. If we can find the file with the information you gave us, we'll email you the file number or reference number. If you don't receive the email in your inbox, check your junk folder.
email-confirmation-msg.may-not-receive: You may not receive an email if:

may-not-receive-list.item-1: the information you gave us doesn't match the information in our system or
may-not-receive-list.item-2: we received the application, but haven't started processing it yet

email-confirmation-msg.please-contact: If you still don't receive it, <Link>contact us</Link>.

email-esrf: Email me the file number or reference number

given-name.title: If the applicant has a single legal name.
given-name.help-message: Enter first name(s) and any middle name(s) of the person who the passport is for.
given-name.label: Given name(s)

header: Get my passport application file number or reference number

header-messages.matches: Make sure the information you enter here matches your passport application.

one-name: Applicants with only one name (single or multiple names entered all in one field) must call us at 1‑800‑567‑6868 to get the status of their application.
request-another: Request another file number or reference number

surname.help-message: Enter last name of the person who the passport is for.
surname.label: Surname on the application
